Key Match Events: Yuki Kawamura scored an NBA career-high 10 points off the bench for the Memphis Grizzlies in a 130-106 loss to the Oklahoma City Thunder.
Shai Gilgeous-Alexander delivered a standout performance with 35 points and seven assists, leading the Oklahoma City Thunder to victory.
Post-Match Reflections: Yuki Kawamura reflected on a tumultuous year of basketball, expressing both pride and frustration over his performance and development.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Oklahoma City Thunder extended their win streak to 11 games and improved their record to 26-5, leading the NBA's Western Conference.
The Memphis Grizzlies are second in the NBA's Western Conference with 22 wins and 11 losses.
